testcase.name: 01 Add/Edit Optimisation Manager details to flight
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns......................................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"...............................................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed When I click on "Campaigns" from home page..................................passed Then All Flights loads which I have access to...............................passed When I search/filter for a flight with no Optimisation Manager..............passed And Click on Apply button...................................................passed Then The box states 'Unknown User'..........................................passed And Option to edit Optimisation Manager exist...............................passed When Select one of Optimisation Manager and Save............................passed Then Optimisation Manager saved.............................................passed When Edit Optimisation Manager and Save.....................................passed Then Edited Optimisation Manager saved......................................passed
